name: Aşağı Yukarı Araf
description:
You passed away and find yourself in a purgatory. You did good things in your life and whatever it happens, you're confident. But in this purgatory, really strange things happening. [Translation on progress!]

How To Play?
  • W, A, D -> Movement and jump
  • Space -> Swing sword
  • E -> Skipping dialogue
  • P -> Restart level
Credits

Game Designer - Ahmet Selim Çelik (Discord: khenzur#8031)

Every content including 2D character visual, animation, background music, script etc. (except the asset packs addressed below) is entirely made by this team within (72-hour) MAĞARA Jam #3 event.

Asset Packs

SFX (Walk, Jump, Growl, Fire, Swoosh etc.) from Zapsplat.com
